title: Community Coaching
body:
Hello I am Mokki an Oce Top lane main and have been playing since s7 and peaked d5 in s8. 

I plan to make a club for people who would like to get involved with coaching but aren't high enough rank, can't get clients
 or people who aren't willing to pay for super high elo coaches. 

I have been in search of somebody to coach more and people that I could coach myself for quite some time now but I've never really cared too much about rank when it comes to getting somebody else to coach more or when it comes to coaching somebody else and that's part of the main reason I'm making this post.

 I have a fairly big gripe when it comes to paying for coaching online as it is hard to find any coaches other than super high elo players that are fairly expensive. 
I am looking for absolutely anybody who wants/needs coaching or anybody that would like to do coaching for free. I am willing to coach anybody willing to coach me. Please HMU if this at all interests you. I'm free from 6pm-9pm

replies.body:
> I am willing to coach anybody willing to coach me

Unless you'll further explain what it mean. I don't understand what you are getting at.

> . I'm free from 6pm-9pm

And which state are you residing in?
